attributes.action: make it illegal to do the Nazi salute anywhere in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After watching the recent Campions League football matches between Manchester United and Roma, I was absolutely disgusted to see some of the Roma "fans" - a gang called the Ultras - doing Nazi salutes.

In Germany, there is a seperate charge of doing a Nazi salute. In the UK, it would come under something like making offensive gestures or offensive behaviour.

Like in Germany, there should be a seperate charge of doing a Nazi salute anywhere in the UK, with the maximun sentence of 5 years behind bars.
